entities.name: rosette
entities.description: The large green rosette is described as being above Viktor Krum's head. It is mentioned that the miniat ure Krum walked backward and forward over Ron’s hand, scowling  up at the green rosette above him.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is described as a Bulgarian Seeker. He is also mentioned to be wearing a small figure of himself that walks backward and forward over Ron’s hand.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the one who bought the Omnioculars and is shown to be looking at them with longing. He also has a dancing shamrock hat.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who buys three pairs of Omnioculars from the saleswizard.

entities.name: saleswizard
entities.description: The saleswizard is described as being eager to sell the Omnioculars. He explains their features and prices them at ten Galleons each.

relationships.description: Ron is shown to be looking at the Omnioculars with longing, indicating that he wants to buy them.
Harry buys three pairs of Omnioculars from the saleswizard.
Ron is shown to be wearing a dancing shamrock hat.
